verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Hew thee \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tables \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tables, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou brokest.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* thou mayst forthwith \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* thou shalt \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w cut|strong="H6458"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* tables \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w rising|strong="H7925"\w* very \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, carrying \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tables.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H8034"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* said: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, \w patient|strong="H0750"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* compassion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w*,

\w Who|strong="H1121"\w* keepest mercy unto \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*: \w who|strong="H1121"\w* takest \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wickedness, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* thee. \w Who|strong="H1121"\w* renderest \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w grandchildren|strong="H1121"\w*, unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H8029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \w generation|strong="H8029"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* making \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w prostrate|strong="H7812"\w* unto \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* adoring,

\w Said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: \w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt \w go|strong="H4994"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*, (\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* stiffnecked \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,) \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w take|strong="H5157"\w* away \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w possess|strong="H5157"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5048"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* signs \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w art|strong="H4639"\w*, \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* terrible \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w myself|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Amorrhite, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hethite, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Pherezite, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Hevite, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* thou \w never|strong="H6435"\w* \w join|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* friendship \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thy ruin:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* statues, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* groves:

Adore \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H0312"\w* strange \w god|strong="H0410"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jealous|strong="H7067"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3772"\w* \w no|strong="H6435"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w men|strong="H7121"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w those|strong="H0310"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w*, \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w they|strong="H0310"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* committed fornication \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* adored \w their|strong="H0398"\w* idols, some \w one|strong="H0776"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* things \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w*.

Neither shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* wife \w for|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, lest \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w they|strong="H0310"\w* \w themselves|strong="H0310"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* committed fornication, \w they|strong="H0310"\w* \w make|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w commit|strong="H2181"\w* fornication \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.
Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* thyself \w any|strong="H3808"\w* molten \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*. \w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* corn: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* springtime thou camest \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* male kind, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* openeth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*, \w shall|strong="H7794"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* mine. \w Of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* beasts, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w* \w and|strong="H4735"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w it|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H7794"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* mine.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstling|strong="H6363"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* ass thou shalt \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*: \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w price|strong="H6299"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* slain. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w work|strong="H5647"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* plough, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* reap.

Thou shalt \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* \w with|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* corn \w of|strong="H8141"\w* thy \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w time|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* returneth \w that|strong="H8141"\w* all \w things|strong="H1061"\w* \w are|strong="H8141"\w* laid \w in|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w males|strong="H2138"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Almighty \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w taken|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w lie|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* wait \w against|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* thrice \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w leaven|strong="H2557"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* there \w remain|strong="H3885"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* thing \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* victim \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* solemnity \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord.

\w The|strong="H0935"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w fruits|strong="H1061"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* thou shalt offer \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w boil|strong="H1310"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* kid \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* dam.
